channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 20:48 Draw alarm to Zaporizhzhia region. Since further messages.
item.description: 游릭 20:48 Draw alarm to Zaporizhzhia region. Since further messages.#Zaporizhzhia This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 20:48 Dumping anxiety in the Kiev region. Follow the following messages.
item.description: 游릭 20:48 Dumping anxiety in the Kiev region. Follow the following messages.#Kyiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 20:48 Drawing of anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Pokrovskaya Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivka Territorial Community

Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Pokrovskaya Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivka Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_.
